name: Bloxd.io Schematic File
summary: Learn about .BLOXDSCHEM files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Bloxd.io is a free game primarily played by kids and teenagers who enjoy block-based games similar to Minecraft. It provides various types of gameplay, including parkour, tag, and build modes. When building, players can construct structures using blocks, and save their progress as BLOXDSCHEM files.

Specifically, BLOXDSCHEM files contain a detailed blueprint of the block arrangement for a specific structure or object, including the types, positions, and orientations of the blocks and specifications for block colors, textures, or materials used in the structure, ensuring Bloxd.io accurately renders the world when loading it. The files also store metadata, such as the build name, creator, and version compatibility with Bloxd.io.

instructions: You can open BLOXDSCHEM files with Bloxd.io in a web browser. To open a BLOXDSCHEM file within the "Worlds" mode, type //schematic load, which pops a prompt for choosing the BLOXDSCHEM file you want to open.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
